column6: Canals reservation protection by concrete lining  For  125mm thick , 0.5m  wide  and 0.4m high canal -double banking.Stream / canal  reservation protection by earth filling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m, Turfing to new sloping  soil surface (DAD  D 01) or planting  single row of vetiver grass with eco friendly edible plants like gotukola, mukunuwenna, thampala etc. including application of compost manure and 02 months maintenance.Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance.Miscellaneous
